summary: This mod adds a cape to almost all vanilla armors in Skyrim. It doesn't replace any armor textures, so you can use it while you'are playing with any retextures of armors you prefer!
descriptionHtml:
Capes for Armors Ver.1.0.

Authors: Eferas and Phate3.

This mod adds a cape to almost all vanilla armors in Skyrim. The missing armors weren't included because they didn't look good with this cape. Both male and female version.

HOW THIS MOD WORKS: it's a replace mod, that means all vanilla armor's meshes are replaced by this mod. Your don't need to search for the capes, they are already on the armors.

HOW TO UNINSTALL: just delete all the files of this mod.

There are different variant of capes, so you can choose what you prefer with Nifskope.

This mod doesn't replace any armor textures, so you can use it while you'are playing with any retextures of armors you prefer!

Please upload screenshots of your characters if you like this mod! We want to see them! :P

Armors in game with cape (male and female):
- Blades
- Dragonscale
- Ebony
- Ebonymail
- Elven (medium and light)
- General Tulius
- Hide (heavy and light)
- Imperial (heavy, medium and light)
- Iron (heavy and light)
- Nordplate
- Steel (heavy and light)
- Wolf

Credits:

- Thanks to Phate3 for textures variant, the brainstorming and the betatesting.
author: Eferas and Phate3
